overview: Be whoever you want to be! Share the fun and excitement of playing dress-up with Minnie, Daisy, and the whole Clubhouse gang! You're invited to MINNIE'S MASQUERADE, a costume party where everyone wins a prize! Help Minnie and Mickey put the finishing touches on their royal crowns, search for "Sir Goofsalot's" missing shoe, and much more. All it takes is a heaping helping of imagination...and the right Mouseketools! So get up on your feet and join the costume parade at the ultimate "mousekerade" ball!
title: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse: Minnie's Masquerade
